title: Firewall connection issues
body:
So this has been happening a lot lately. 
I can log in fine and get into champ select but as soon as i get into loading my screen stays black and continues to "load". 
I can't connect and the game "crashes" over and over. I've tried turning on/off my firewall and checking the "inbound rules" log and realizing that "League of Legends" isn't even there.. 
This usually fixes itself in time and only time but never the same time. Once it lasted 3 days and once just a game. I've tried re-installing everything and nothing has worked to fix it and it's getting really frustrating. Any help OCE?
